title: Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report that the Biden administration plans next month to broaden curbs on U.S shipments to China […]

The post Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report that the Biden administration plans next month to broaden curbs on U.S shipments to China of semiconductors used for artificial intelligence and chipmaking tools. The move would expand the reach of the limits and could subject other U.S. companies producing similar technology to the restrictions.Â 

The post Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
